hypothesis_content.title: Regulatory News Volatility Regime Accelerator
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, positive regulatory news (MiCA implementation, ETF approvals) combined with overnight Asian session buying (2am-8am UTC volume spike >2x average) accelerates transition to BULL regime within 3 trading days with 65% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity reduces institutional uncertainty. Asian session reaction provides early signal of global institutional response before US/Europe markets open.
entry_conditions: Asian session (2am-8am UTC) volume > 2x 20-day average for that session
Price holds above pre-news high for 6 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain or regime confirms BULL (5-day momentum > 3%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: News sentiment reverses (score < 0.3) or price drops below pre-news low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: News-driven moves fail to sustain beyond 3 days in >35% of cases, or show no regime transition predictive power.
